entry.title: Today in DeFi - Lumio Move L2 on Testnet, Phantom Supports Bitcoin, Fraxchain Airdrop+Points System Coming, Lending ETH for a High Yield, and more...
entry.summary: Launches ğŸš€ Built by Pomtent Network, Lumio is the first Move L2 that is EVM-compatible, built using the OP Stack, and settles on Ethereum while leveraging Move VM, Aptosâ€™ virtual machine. Lumio is now on testnet and will open up in waves to a whitelist of users over time.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - ZKFair Fair-launches zk-Rollup, Flooring Protocol 2M Exploit, Frame Airdrops NFT Traders, Leveraged Trade LST Yield, and more...
entry.summary: Launches ğŸš€ ZKFair launches its mainnet. ZKFair is a community-owned ZK L2 build using Polygon CDK, Celestia DA, and Lumoz RaaS. ZKFair adopts a 100% fair launch approach, all ZKF tokens will be airdropped to the community. Aori V1 is live on Arbitrum. Aori is a high-frequency orderbook that allows â€œflash market makingâ€, connecting CeFi/DeFi arbitrageurs to MEV searchers, solvers, and DeFi-native market makers.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Gearbox V3 Live, Ipor Launches Stake Rate Swap, High-Yield Stable Farms, One-Click High-Yield Farming, and more...
entry.summary: Launches ğŸš€ Gearbox V3 is live with PURE margin trading, new assets, and better organic rates. APYs depend on TVL migrated, and there is no new inflation in GEAR. ETH restaking protocol Renzo is live no EigenLayer. Renzo is the interface to the EigenLayer ecosystem securing Actively Validated Services (AVSs) and offering a higher yield than ETH staking.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Arbitrum One Outage, Gearbox v3 Upcoming, Innovative Stable Yield, Delta Neutral Farming with Airdrop Potential, and more...
entry.summary: Launches ğŸš€ Web3 portfolio viewer vfat launches Yield, allowing users to compare yield products across DeFi, and enter and exit positions in one transaction. Updates ğŸ†• Infinex introduced Infinex Account, allowing users to create their account through social sign-in, and interact with Infinex.

entry.title: Last Week in DeFi - Clearpool Prime on OP, LayerZero V2 on Testnet, Sturdy V2 Upcoming, IntentX Multiplier Points, and more...
entry.summary: Recap: Week of Dec 11th

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Lyra V2 Live, Ledger Library Exploit, Pendle V3 Upcoming, Trade LST Interest Rates with a Potential Catalyst, and more...
entry.summary: Launches ğŸš€ Lyra launches V2, enabling trading for options, perpetual, and spots. Lyra also started the BTC PVP competition, allowing traders to earn PVPoints and win LYRA. Updates ğŸ†• LayerZero launches V2 on testnets, with mainnet releasing in 2024. V2 is an upgrade that increases network throughput and liveness while making it easier for developers to build and integrate dApps with LayerZero.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Redacted Cartel Pirex ETH on Mainnet, Pendle Introduces V3, High Organic Yield on Stables, Intent-based Shortcuts with Rewards, and more...
entry.summary: Launches ğŸš€ Redacted Cartel launches the Pirex ETH (pxETH) on the Ethereum mainnet, marking the first phase of the Dinero rollout. Pirex ETH consists of pxETH and apxETH, giving users two choices: pxETH for liquidity or apxETH for boosted staking yield.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - SSV Permissionless Mainnet Live, Conic Finance to Launch V2, High-Yield Stable Farm on Kava, Access Solana DeFi with EVM Wallet, and more...
entry.summary: Launches ğŸš€ DVT network SSV launched its permissionless mainnet, removing the limitation that restricts the onboarding of validators and operators only to launch partners. Clearpool launches Clearpool Prime on OP Mainnet. Prime allows whitelisted, institutional borrowers to launch pools with tailored terms and invite similarly whitelisted lenders to participate.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Poolshark Live on Arbitrum, Uniswap Expands to Bitcoin Sidechain, Sen. Warren Introduces Anti-Crypto Bill, Bridging to Solana with Ease, and more...
entry.summary: Launches ğŸš€ Poolshark launched on Arbitrum mainnet along with its token sale. Poolshark Protocol is an AMM that enables directional LPing. Powered by Wormhole, Circle, and Base, Pike Finance launches testnet on Ethereum, Optimism, Arbitrum, and Base L2. Pike is a cross-chain lending protocol that offers lending, leverage, and Earn services.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Lyra Chain Live, Synthetix Voting to End Inflation, LayerZero Confirms Token, Low-Risk LPing with Airdrop, and more...
entry.summary: Launches ğŸš€ Options protocol Lyra launches Lyra Chain, an OP stack-powered L2 providing high throughput, low-cost settlement of transactions. Upcoming â³ Synthetix Spartan Council is voting to end SNX inflation. If approved, SNX inflation will be reduced to zero in the claim week following the vote.

entry.title: Last Week in DeFi - QuickSwap Bonds Live, Liquity Introduces Desktop Frontend, LSDfi Apollo Launching on Neutron, Kamino Points Coming, and More...

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Gyroscope Launches GYD Stablecoin, Safe Introduces Recovery Hub , Marginfi to Launch Solana LST-backed Stablecoin, High Yield Staking on Avalanche, and more...
entry.summary: Launches ğŸš€ Gyroscope launches GYD, a dollar-pegged stablecoin backed by reserve assets, and features an algorithmic mechanism to keep its price pegged to $1. Users can now mint GYD or provide liquidity to GYD pools. Crypto Volatility Index launches CVI V4, introducing new features such as the Hedged Theta Vault, a ~3x stretched version of the CVI, borrower leverage, etc.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Aevo Launches Yield-Bearing aeUSD, Worldcoin Decentralizing, New Lending Pool with OP Rewards, No Fee Swaps with Airdrop, and more...
entry.summary: Launches ğŸš€ Aevo launches aeUSD, a yield-bearing stables-denominated collateral asset (5% USDC and 95% sDAI) that allows users to earn a 4.75% APY on their exchange margin while trading with 20x leverage. QuickSwap launches QuickSwap Bonds on the DEX, a new way for liquidity provision. Users can provide liquidity and receive tokens at a discount that vest over time, represented by a Bond NFT.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Helium Launches $20 Unlimited Mobile Plans, Matcha Launches Cross-chain Swaps, Premia Blue Season, Upcoming Airdrop on Solana, and more...
entry.summary: Launches ğŸš€ Helium Mobile launches a nationwide plan in the US. with unlimited data, text, and talk that costs $20 a month. Helium Mobile combines the Solana-based IoT project Helium Network and a nationwide 5G network. Hashflow DEX launches 2.0. The upgraded version enables Smart Order Routing (SOR), improved UX, and Solana expansion.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Mantle Launches mETH LSD, Osmosis Merger Proposal, 20%+ Stable Farms, Upcoming TGE Analysis, and more...
entry.summary: Launches ğŸš€ Mantle L2 launches two products: Mantle LSP and mETH. Mantle LSP is a liquid staking protocol that enables users to stake ETH for mETH and earn rewards. Updates ğŸ†• Aave DAO proposes to increase the GHO borrow rate from 5.35% APR to 6.35% APR to support the GHO peg restoration and align borrowing costs with market rates.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Obol Mainnet Live, Platypus Hackers Acquitted, Rhino Announces New Token, High Stable Yields, and more...
entry.summary: Launches ğŸš€ Obol Mainnet Live Obol launched Mainnet Open Beta with three products available: Mainnet DV Launchpad, Obol SDK, and Obol Splits. StarkDefi on Starknet StarkDeFi launches an AMM on Starknet Mainnet, with other features coming soon: Farm, Launchpad, Quest, etc.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Yearn V3 Live, Hacker Demands to Take Over Kyber, Cega Dual Currency Strategies, Optimized LPing on Solana, and more...
entry.summary: Launches ğŸš€ Yearn V3 Live on Polygon Yearn V3 introduces Tokenized Strategies, allowing for standalone, single-strategy vaults that are ERC-4626 compatible. V3 is now on Polygon and will be rolling out slowly, with new Vaults and strategies added over time ahead of launching on other chains.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - SDX Live on Solana, QuickSwap Smart Pools on Manta, Kujira Futures Soon, Easy and Profitable LPing, and more...
entry.summary: Launches ğŸš€ SDX Live on Solana Solana Derivatives Exchange (SDX) launches on Solana. SDX enables options trading on Solana, with mSOL as the first supported option market. Econia Live on Aptos Econia, a Dragonfly-backed on-chain order book, launches on Aptos mainnet. Econia provides the infrastructure and allows users to trade with their frontend partners such as Aries Markets, Gator Trade, KanaLabs, etc.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Velodrome & Aerodrome Frontend Exploit, StakeWise V3 Live, Cryptex V2 on Arbitrum, NFT Lending on Solana, and more...
entry.summary: Launches ğŸš€ StakeWise V3 Live StakeWise V3 is now live on the Ethereum mainnet. V3 introduces a new approach to liquid staking, â€œany node operator and staker on Ethereum can mint osETH, a liquid staking token, to represent ETH staked on their nodes.â€ V3 also comes with a marketplace of staking offers through smart contracts called Vaults.
